document.full_text: more than 10,000 pounds of lean cuisine frozen spaghetti and meatball dishes have been recalled because of the possible presence of foreign materials, the department of agriculture said late on monday.
document.title: some lean cuisine dishes recalled
lines_and_colors: more than 10,000 pounds of lean cuisine frozen spaghetti and meatball dishes have been recalled because of the possible presence of foreign materials, the department of agriculture said late on monday.
